title: Promise

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day, show meaning to a non-Partisan player. During the night, they may choose to turn away or face the light. 
> — If your target turns away, you will not be able to show meaning to them again and your enjoin ability will fail if you used it this night.
> — If your target faces the light, they will no longer be able to see the day chat or keep a will. However, they will gain access to the Partisan factional chat. 
- At night, enjoin a player who faced the light. They will gain one use of 484: A Vampire Clone's ability tonight, which would fail on players with a Partisan goal. You may not enjoin the same player more than once.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Adding a player to the Partisan factional chat does not affect their goal.
- Changing a player's goal does not add them to or remove them from factional chats.
